posts.cooked_content:
I have doubt in question 10 to convert pdf to markdown
I am not getting correct markdown
@pds_staff
posts.cleaned_text: I have doubt in question 10 to convert pdf to markdown I am not getting correct markdown @pds_staff

posts.cooked_content:
Try using the pymupdf4llm Library
pip install pymupdf4llm

import pymupdf4llm
md_text = pymupdf4llm.to_markdown(“input.pdf”)

import pathlib
pathlib.Path(“output.md”).write_bytes(md_text.encode())

import pymupdf4llm
llama_reader = pymupdf4llm.LlamaMarkdownReader()
llama_docs = llama_reader.load_data(“input.pdf”)
posts.cleaned_text: Try using the pymupdf4llm Library pip install pymupdf4llm import pymupdf4llm md_text = pymupdf4llm.to_markdown(“input.pdf”) import pathlib pathlib.Path(“output.md”).write_bytes(md_text.encode()) import pymupdf4llm llama_reader = pymupdf4llm.LlamaMarkdownReader() llama_docs = llama_reader.load_data(“input.pdf”)
